metadata.name: È cacca
metadata.description:
If you think Manzoni shit in the can, this is your painting. If not, choose the one titled "È gesso".  
It is part of the "Shit or Plaster" Project, whose objective is to get some owner of the 90 physical cans to open it, so that we can finally know if there is shit or plaster inside.  
More information at https://martinlindenmayer.art/shit-or-plaster-project/
